abstract: It was another dismal week for the stock market, despite a short-lived rally on Thursday after Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke  hinted of further rate cuts.
snippet: It was another dismal week for the stock market, despite a short-lived rally on Thursday after Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke  hinted of further rate cuts.
lead_paragraph: It was another dismal week for the stock market, despite a short-lived rally on Thursday after Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, signaled that the Fed is ready to cut interest rates further.

headline.main: A Fed Signal Can’t Dispel the Gloom
headline.print_headline: A Fed Signal Can’t Dispel the Gloom
